name: Bat to Bed
description:
Using deceptively-simple one-button movement, you must flap your way from the forest floor up to your home in the treetops so that you can finally get some well-earned rest.

This journey is a punishing one.
3 levels of increasing length and difficulty will have you in suspense all the way to the end.

The often rage-inducing gameplay is nicely juxtaposed against peaceful forest sounds and meditative music that will (hopefully) help you keep your sanity long enough to make it to the top. Good luck!
